attributes.review: i cannot BELIEVE this app. i open it to find this... this MUTATED ORANGE grimacing at me. was it a grimace? or was it the orange’s pathetic attempt at a smile? either way, very horrifying. i will NOT be associating myself with the abomination called trump again.
